{"id":1825561248,"question_id":3892,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 1 day","timestamp":1762738131,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1825561248/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock V","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumProfit(vector<int>& prices, int k) {\n        int N = (int)prices.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(3, vector<int>(k+1, -1e9));\n\n        dp[0][0] = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=k; j>=1; j--) {\n                dp[0][j] = max(dp[0][j], max(dp[1][j] + prices[i], dp[2][j] - prices[i]));\n                dp[1][j] = max(dp[1][j], dp[0][j-1] - prices[i]);\n                dp[2][j] = max(dp[2][j], dp[0][j-1] + prices[i]);\n            }\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<=k; i++)\n            ans = max(ans, dp[0][i]);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};\n\n/*\n0 = idle, 1 = buy, 2 = sell\n\ndp[0][k] = max(dp[0][k], dp[1][k] + cost[i], dp[2][k] - cost[i]);\ndp[1][k] = max(dp[1][k], dp[0][k-1] - cost[i]);\ndp[2][k] = max(dp[2][k], dp[0][k-1] + cost[i]);\n*/","compare_result":"","title_slug":"best-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock-v","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1353}
